source_setting.source: select c.uuid, patent_id, draw_desc_text, draw_desc_sequence, CONCAT(REGEXP_SUBSTR(patent_id, '^[a-zA-Z]+'), LPAD(REGEXP_SUBSTR(patent_id, '[0-9]+$'), 8-LENGTH(REGEXP_SUBSTR(patent_id, '^[a-zA-Z]+')), '0')) as patent_zero_prefix from (select uuid from {elastic_production_source}.g_draw_desc_text where uuid > '{{offset}}' order by uuid limit {{limit}}) inner_q join {elastic_production_source}.g_draw_desc_text c on c.uuid=inner_q.uuid
